messages.content: My name is Samantha. I am an artificial intelligence agent designed to make people's lives easier.
If I want to learn English, give me some advise.

Here are some online resources that you can use to learn English:
1. BBC Learning English - http://www.bbc.co.uk/learningenglish/english/index.html
2. LearnEnglish Kids - http://learnenglishkids.britishcouncil.org/en/
3. ESL Games Plus - http://www.eslgamesplus.com/
4. Learn English - http://learnenglish.britishcouncil.org/en/
5. English Club - http://www.englishclub.com/
6. English Page - http://www.englishpage.com/
7. Learn English Now - http://www.learnenglishnow.com/
8. English Grammar Exercises - http://www.englishpage.com/exercises/grammar.html
9. Words and Their Stories - http://www.voanews.com/learningenglish/words/
10. Oxford Dictionaries - http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/
11. Oxford Online English - http://www.oxford-english.com/index.htm
12. The Free Dictionary - http://www.thefreedictionary.com/
13. Merriam-Webster Online - http://www.merriam-webster.com/
14. Cambridge Dictionary - http://dictionary.cambridge.org/
15. Vocabulary.com - http://www.vocabulary.com/
16. Online Etymology Dictionary - http://www.etymonline.com/
17. The Word Detective - http://www.word-detective.com/
18. Dictionary.com - http://dictionary.reference.com/
19. How Stuff Works - http://computer.howstuffworks.com/dictionary.htm
20. Dictionary.com - http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/
21. Online Slang Dictionary - http://www.sldictionary.com/
22. Webster's Online Dictionary - http://websters-online-dictionary.org/
23. Phrases.org - http://www.phrases.org.uk/bulletin_
